body_content.explanation: the process of adding numbers or amounts together:
examples: Twice a week the children are tested in basic mathematical skills such as addition (= calculating the total of different numbers put together) and subtraction.
In addition to his apartment in Manhattan, he has a villa in Italy and a castle in Scotland.

body_content.explanation: something that has been added to something else:
examples: He admits tofu is a useful addition to the range of meat alternatives available.
Her latest novel is a worthy addition to the spy thriller genre.
Fresh summer vegetables are a welcome addition to many recipes.
I have many exotic plants in my collection, and this orchid is my latest addition.
The new model is the latest addition to the range.

body_content.explanation: someone new who has joined or been added to a group:
examples: We have had several new additions to the family recently.
A new secretary would be a welcome addition.

body_content.explanation: the act of adding a substance or thing to something else:
examples: Most working environments are improved by the addition of (= by adding) a few plants and pictures.

body_content.explanation: a new part added to a house or other building:
examples: We're building an addition to our house.
